author: chirino
msg: - Gaurd access to dispatched list ( a sync was missing).
- Added better exception messages to know what happened when a slave subscription gets out of sync with the master.

author: cutting
msg: Fix HADOOP-174.  Make job client try up to five times to contact job tracker before aborting a job.  Contributed by Owen.

author: ekoneil
msg: Add Ant <sleep/> to the Controls tests so that the checkin and detaild tests have a pause in order to let the server shutdown.

author: hossman
msg: moved DateField format question so it shows up in javadocs
